HitPoints.Title: Hit Points
HitPoints.Body: Your current and maximum HP. Reaching 0 means you are unconscious or dying.

DamageThreshold.Title: Damage Threshold
DamageThreshold.Body: If a single attack deals this much damage or more, you move down the condition track.

ForcePoints.Title: Force Points
ForcePoints.Body: Spend to add a bonus die to any d20 roll, activate certain abilities, or avoid death.

DestinyPoints.Title: Destiny Points
DestinyPoints.Body: Rare points that let you automatically succeed on a roll or trigger special destiny effects.

ConditionTrack.Title: Condition Track
ConditionTrack.Body: Tracks penalties from taking heavy hits. Each step down applies cumulative -1 to all rolls and defenses.

BaseAttackBonus.Title: Base Attack Bonus
BaseAttackBonus.Body: Added to attack rolls. Determined by class and level.

Grapple.Title: Grapple
Grapple.Body: Used for grab and grapple checks. Based on BAB and size modifier.

Initiative.Title: Initiative
Initiative.Body: Determines turn order in combat. Based on Dexterity and any bonuses.

ReflexDefense.Title: Reflex Defense
ReflexDefense.Body: Targeted by most attacks. Based on class, level, Dexterity or armor bonus.

FortitudeDefense.Title: Fortitude Defense
FortitudeDefense.Body: Resists physical effects like poison and stun. Based on class, level, and Constitution.

WillDefense.Title: Will Defense
WillDefense.Body: Resists mental effects and Force powers. Based on class, level, and Wisdom.

FlatFooted.Title: Flat-Footed
FlatFooted.Body: Defense when caught off guard. Does not include Dexterity or dodge bonuses.

AbilityScore.Title: Ability Score
AbilityScore.Body: The raw score. The modifier (score minus 10, divided by 2) is what applies to rolls.

AbilityModifier.Title: Ability Modifier
AbilityModifier.Body: Derived from the ability score. Added to relevant rolls, skills, and defenses.

SkillTrained.Title: Trained Skill
SkillTrained.Body: Trained skills receive a +5 bonus and may unlock special uses not available untrained.

SkillRoll.Title: Skill Check
SkillRoll.Body: Click to roll this skill. The roll adds your modifier and training bonus.

PassiveTalent.Title: Passive Talent
PassiveTalent.Body: Always active. No action required to benefit from this talent.

ActiveTalent.Title: Active Talent
ActiveTalent.Body: Requires an action to use. Check the talent description for action type.

UsageLimit.Title: Limited Use
UsageLimit.Body: This ability can only be used a set number of times per encounter or per day.

WeaponAttack.Title: Attack Roll
WeaponAttack.Body: Click to roll an attack with this weapon against a target's Reflex Defense.

WeaponDamage.Title: Damage Roll
WeaponDamage.Body: Click to roll damage for this weapon after a successful attack.

ArmorPenalty.Title: Armor Penalty
ArmorPenalty.Body: This armor applies a penalty to Reflex Defense beyond the armor bonus and may restrict Dexterity.

ActionPalette.Title: Action Palette
ActionPalette.Body: Quick access to common combat and narrative actions for your character.

PaletteMode.Title: Palette Mode
PaletteMode.Body: Switches between combat actions and narrative/exploration actions.

ActionDisabled.Title: Action Unavailable
ActionDisabled.Body: This action cannot be used right now. Check prerequisites and available resources.

ChargenNarrative.Title: Narrative Mode
ChargenNarrative.Body: Build your character through guided story choices instead of manual stat selection.

ChargenMentor.Title: Mentor Selection
ChargenMentor.Body: Choose a mentor whose guidance shapes your character creation experience.

ChargenRollMethod.Title: Ability Score Method
ChargenRollMethod.Body: Select how to generate ability scores: roll dice, point buy, or standard array.

ChargenSpecies.Title: Species
ChargenSpecies.Body: Your species determines base traits, ability adjustments, and available features.

ChargenClass.Title: Class
ChargenClass.Body: Your class determines hit points, defenses, trained skills, and talent access.

ChargenLockin.Title: Finalize Character
ChargenLockin.Body: Confirms your choices. Most selections can still be adjusted after creation.

MentorDialogue.Title: Mentor Guidance
MentorDialogue.Body: Your mentor offers context and suggestions. This is advisory, not mandatory.

AurebeshTranslation.Title: Aurebesh Translation
AurebeshTranslation.Body: Text appears in Aurebesh first, then translates. Click to skip the effect.

TacticalOverlay.Title: Tactical Overlay
TacticalOverlay.Body: Shows range bands, threat areas, and tactical information on the map.

GMSuggestion.Title: GM Suggestion
GMSuggestion.Body: Advisory insight from the suggestion engine. Not applied automatically.

GMPaletteMode.Title: GM Mode
GMPaletteMode.Body: Switches the palette to GM tools: NPC spawning, healing, condition management.

actionPaletteFirstOpen.Title: Action Palette
actionPaletteFirstOpen.Body: This is your quick-access action menu. It adapts to combat and narrative contexts. You can customize it to fit your playstyle.

tacticalOverlayFirstOpen.Title: Tactical Overlay
tacticalOverlayFirstOpen.Body: Toggle map overlays showing range bands, threat zones, and positioning data. Each layer can be toggled independently.

mentorTranslationFirst.Title: Mentor Dialogue
mentorTranslationFirst.Body: Mentor text appears with an Aurebesh translation effect. Click anywhere on the text to skip the animation and read immediately.

gmSuggestionPanelFirst.Title: GM Suggestions
gmSuggestionPanelFirst.Body: These are advisory insights based on the current encounter. Nothing is applied automatically. Use them as you see fit.

chargenNarrativeFirst.Title: Character Creation Modes
chargenNarrativeFirst.Body: You can build your character through narrative choices or direct mechanical selection. Both paths produce a fully valid character.

Player.Title: Welcome to Star Wars Saga Edition
Player.Subtitle: Here are a few things to help you get started. All features are optional.
Player.Item1: Character creation supports both narrative and mechanical modes
Player.Item2: The Action Palette provides quick access to combat and narrative actions
Player.Item3: Mentors can guide your choices during character creation
Player.Item4: Hover over any highlighted UI element for a quick explanation
Player.Item5: All guided hints can be turned off in your client settings

GM.Title: Welcome to Star Wars Saga Edition (GM Tools)
GM.Subtitle: Your GM toolkit includes several optional systems. Nothing runs unless you enable it.
GM.Item1: The Tactical Overlay adds range and threat visualization to scenes
GM.Item2: GM Suggestions offer advisory encounter insights, never automatic
GM.Item3: Scene tools and NPC management are available from the sidebar and palette
GM.Item4: All automation (damage threshold, condition recovery) can be toggled in settings
GM.Item5: Discovery hints can be reset or disabled from system settings
